product_name: Gaiam Sol Adara Rubber Yoga Mat - 2011 Closeout
long_description: The Gaiam Sol Adara Rubber yoga mat has a natural rubber core overlaid with a durable cotton mesh which provides good grip without being sticky. 4mm padding keeps you comfortable while still allowing good balance. Spot clean with damp cloth, cold water and mild detergent; dry flat. Closeout.
short_description: The Gaiam Sol Adara Rubber yoga mat has a natural rubber core overlaid with a durable cotton mesh which provides good grip without being sticky.
